text: I don't know if a mailing list is needed for the moment but there is absolutely no information about how to contact us in case of problems.
title: There is no contact information on the website.
There is no contact information on the website.

text:
> Still no information. Do we want to put an email adress? We could use
> nilearn's gmail account for that. Or do we rely on github issues to get
> people feedback ? @GaelVaroquaux

Right now let's really on issues, and not mention it: either people are
clever enough to find it, or we don't want their feedback.
